Package com.soprabanking.ips.daos

Class CommentDAO

java.lang.Object
com.soprabanking.ips.daos.CommentDAO
@Component
public class CommentDAO
extends java.lang.Object
This class is a Data Access Object Class for Comment shown on proposals.It has the following methods
  • fetchAllComments method to fetch all the comments of a given proposal
  • createComment method to save the comment
  • deleteComment to delete a comment
Author:
mojha
See Also:
Component, Autowired

    java.util.List<Comment> fetchAllComments​(java.lang.Long proposalId)
    This is a method used to fetch all comments on a proposal using the proposal id in a list.

  • Constructor Details

    • CommentDAO

      public CommentDAO()

  • Method Details

    • fetchAllComments

      public java.util.List<Comment> fetchAllComments​(java.lang.Long proposalId)
      This is a method used to fetch all comments on a proposal using the proposal id in a list. It uses a method findAllByProposalIdOrderByCreationDateDesc which is in the CommentRepository Repository
      Parameters:
      proposalId - :The Id of the proposal to which the comments belong
      Returns:
      :A list of sorted comments
      See Also:
      com.soprabanking.ips.models.Comment, CommentRepository

    • createComment

      public Comment createComment​(Comment com)
      This method will create a comment and save it using the save method.
      Parameters:
      com - : It is a object of class Comment in the Comment model.
      Returns:
      saved: It is a comment object with the saved details
      See Also:
      com.soprabanking.ips.models.Comment, com.soprabanking.ips.repositories.CommentRepository

    • deleteComment

      public void deleteComment​(java.lang.Long id)
      This method will delete a comment by its id.
      Parameters:
      id - : It is the id of the comment
      See Also:
      com.soprabanking.ips.repositories.CommentRepository
